dc:title: On Pilgrimage - June 1975
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Vignettes from her date book--life at the beach house on Staten Island, visitors, books she is reading, meetings attended, and visits to Catholic Worker houses and her family.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 552 1975-06-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
